00066 /**
00067  * Clear the interrupt rising edge detector for the supplied
00068  * pins in the mask. Chips which have more than 16 GPIO pins
00069  * can't use them for interrupts.
00070  *
00071  * @param node       Node to clear
00072  * @param clear_mask Mask of pins to clear
00073  */
00074 static inline void __cvmx_gpio_interrupt_clear(uint8_t node,
00075                            uint64_t clear_mask)
00076 {
00077     if (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN61XX) || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN70XX)) {
00078         cvmx_gpio_multi_cast_t multi_cast;
00079         cvmx_gpio_bit_cfgx_t gpio_bit;
00080         int core = cvmx_get_core_num();
00081 
00082         multi_cast.u64 = cvmx_read_csr_node(node, CVMX_GPIO_MULTI_CAST);
00083         gpio_bit.u64 = cvmx_read_csr_node(node, CVMX_GPIO_BIT_CFGX(core));
00084 
00085         /* If Multicast mode is enabled, and GPIO interrupt is enabled
00086          * for edge detection, then GPIO<4..7> interrupts are per core
00087          */
00088         if (multi_cast.s.en && gpio_bit.s.int_en && gpio_bit.s.int_type) {
00089             /* Clear GPIO<4..7> per core */
00090             cvmx_ciu_intx_sum0_t ciu_sum0;
00091             ciu_sum0.u64 = cvmx_read_csr_node(node,
00092                               CVMX_CIU_INTX_SUM0(core * 2));
00093             ciu_sum0.s.gpio = clear_mask & 0xf0;
00094             cvmx_write_csr_node(node, CVMX_CIU_INTX_SUM0(core * 2),
00095                         ciu_sum0.u64);
00096 
00097             /* Clear other GPIO pins for all cores. */
00098             cvmx_write_csr_node(node, CVMX_GPIO_INT_CLR,
00099                         (clear_mask & ~0xf0));
00100             return;
00101         }
00102     } else if (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN78XX)
00103            || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN73XX)
00104            || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF75XX)) {
00105         cvmx_dprintf("%s: Not yet implemented for 7xxx!\n", __func__);
00106     } else {
00107         /*
00108          * For all models except 70xx, 61xx:
00109          * Clear GPIO pins state across all cores and
00110          * common interrupt states.
00111          */
00112         cvmx_gpio_int_clr_t gpio_int_clr;
00113 
00114         gpio_int_clr.u64 = 0;
00115         gpio_int_clr.s.type = clear_mask;
00116         cvmx_write_csr_node(node, CVMX_GPIO_INT_CLR, gpio_int_clr.u64);
00117     }
00118 }
00119 
00120 /**
00121  * Clear the interrupt rising edge detector for the supplied
00122  * pins in the mask. Chips which have more than 16 GPIO pins
00123  * can't use them for interrupts.
00124  * @deprecated
00125  *
00126  * @param clear_mask Mask of pins to clear
00127  */
00128 static inline void cvmx_gpio_interrupt_clear(uint64_t clear_mask)
00129 {
00130     __cvmx_gpio_interrupt_clear(0, clear_mask);
00131 }
00132 
00133 static inline void cvmx_gpio_interrupt_clear_node(int node,
00134                           uint64_t clear_mask)
00135 {
00136     __cvmx_gpio_interrupt_clear(node, clear_mask);
00137 }
00138 
00139 /**
00140  * GPIO configure Pin on the specified node
00141  *
00142  * @param node  Node to read from
00143  * @param bit   The GPIO to use
00144  * @param mode  Drive GPIO as output pin or not.
00145  *
00146  */
00147 static inline void __cvmx_gpio_cfg(uint8_t node, int bit, int mode)
00148 {
00149     if (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN78XX)
00150         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN73XX)
00151         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF75XX)) {
00152         cvmx_gpio_bit_cfgx_t bit_cfg;
00153 
00154         bit_cfg.u64 = cvmx_read_csr_node(node, CVMX_GPIO_BIT_CFGX(bit));
00155         bit_cfg.s.tx_oe = !!mode;
00156         cvmx_write_csr_node(node, CVMX_GPIO_BIT_CFGX(bit), bit_cfg.u64);
00157         return;
00158     }
00159     if (bit > 15 && bit < 20) {
00160         /* CN61XX/CN66XX has 20 GPIO pins and only 16 are interruptable. */
00161         if (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN61XX)
00162             || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN66XX)
00163             || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN70XX)) {
00164             cvmx_gpio_xbit_cfgx_t gpio_xbit;
00165             gpio_xbit.u64 = cvmx_read_csr_node(node,
00166                                CVMX_GPIO_XBIT_CFGX(bit));
00167             gpio_xbit.s.tx_oe = !!mode;
00168             cvmx_write_csr_node(node, CVMX_GPIO_XBIT_CFGX(bit),
00169                         gpio_xbit.u64);
00170         } else
00171             cvmx_dprintf("%s: Invalid GPIO bit(%d)\n",
00172                      __func__, bit);
00173     } else {
00174         cvmx_gpio_bit_cfgx_t gpio_bit;
00175         gpio_bit.u64 = cvmx_read_csr_node(node, CVMX_GPIO_BIT_CFGX(bit));
00176         gpio_bit.s.tx_oe = !!mode;
00177         cvmx_write_csr_node(node, CVMX_GPIO_BIT_CFGX(bit), gpio_bit.u64);
00178     }
00179 }
00180 
00181 /**
00182  * GPIO configure output selection mode
00183  *
00184  * @param node  Node to configure
00185  * @param bit   The GPIO to configure
00186  * @param output_sel    output selection value
00187  */
00188 static inline void cvmx_gpio_cfg_sel(uint8_t node, int bit, int output_sel)
00189 {
00190     if (!OCTEON_IS_OCTEON3()) {
00191         cvmx_dprintf("%s: Only OCTEON3 required.", __func__);
00192         return;
00193     }
00194 
00195     if (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN78XX)
00196         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN73XX)
00197         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF75XX)) {
00198         cvmx_gpio_bit_cfgx_t bit_cfg;
00199         bit_cfg.u64 = cvmx_read_csr_node(node, CVMX_GPIO_BIT_CFGX(bit));
00200         bit_cfg.cn70xx.output_sel = output_sel;
00201         cvmx_write_csr_node(node, CVMX_GPIO_BIT_CFGX(bit), bit_cfg.u64);
00202         return;
00203     }
00204 
00205     if (bit > 15 && bit < 20) {
00206         cvmx_gpio_xbit_cfgx_t gpio_xbit;
00207         gpio_xbit.u64 = cvmx_read_csr_node(node,
00208                            CVMX_GPIO_XBIT_CFGX(bit));
00209         gpio_xbit.cn70xx.output_sel = output_sel;
00210         cvmx_write_csr_node(node, CVMX_GPIO_XBIT_CFGX(bit),
00211                     gpio_xbit.u64);
00212     } else {
00213         cvmx_gpio_bit_cfgx_t gpio_bit;
00214         gpio_bit.u64 = cvmx_read_csr_node(node, CVMX_GPIO_BIT_CFGX(bit));
00215         gpio_bit.cn70xx.output_sel = output_sel;
00216         cvmx_write_csr_node(node, CVMX_GPIO_BIT_CFGX(bit),
00217                     gpio_bit.u64);
00218     }
00219 }
00220 
00221 /**
00222  * Inverts the input to a GPIO
00223  *
00224  * @param node  Node to configure
00225  * @param bit   The GPIO to configure
00226  * @param invert    1 to invert input, 0 to not invert
00227  */
00228 static inline void cvmx_gpio_invert_input(uint8_t node, int bit, int invert)
00229 {
00230     if (OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN78XX)
00231         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CN73XX)
00232         || OCTEON_IS_MODEL(OCTEON_CNF75XX)) {
00233         cvmx_gpio_bit_cfgx_t bit_cfg;
00234         bit_cfg.u64 = cvmx_read_csr_node(node, CVMX_GPIO_BIT_CFGX(bit));
00235         bit_cfg.s.rx_xor = !!invert;
00236         cvmx_write_csr_node(node, CVMX_GPIO_BIT_CFGX(bit), bit_cfg.u64);
00237         return;
00238     }
00239 
00240     if (bit > 15 && bit < 20) {
00241         cvmx_gpio_xbit_cfgx_t gpio_xbit;
00242         gpio_xbit.u64 = cvmx_read_csr_node(node,
00243                            CVMX_GPIO_XBIT_CFGX(bit));
00244         gpio_xbit.s.rx_xor = !!invert;
00245         cvmx_write_csr_node(node, CVMX_GPIO_XBIT_CFGX(bit),
00246                     gpio_xbit.u64);
00247     } else {
00248         cvmx_gpio_bit_cfgx_t gpio_bit;
00249         gpio_bit.u64 = cvmx_read_csr_node(node,
00250                           CVMX_GPIO_BIT_CFGX(bit));
00251         gpio_bit.s.rx_xor = !!invert;
00252         cvmx_write_csr_node(node, CVMX_GPIO_BIT_CFGX(bit),
00253                     gpio_bit.u64);
00254     }
00255 }

00257 /**
00258  * GPIO configure Pin
00259  * @deprecated
00260  *
00261  * @param bit   The GPIO to use
00262  * @param mode  Drive GPIO as output pin or not.
00263  *
00264  */
00265 static inline void cvmx_gpio_cfg(int bit, int mode)
00266 {
00267     __cvmx_gpio_cfg(0, bit, mode);
00268 }
00269 
00270 static inline void cvmx_gpio_cfg_node(int node, int bit, int mode)
00271 {
00272     __cvmx_gpio_cfg(node, bit, mode);
00273 }

00275 /**
00276  * GPIO Read Data
00277  *
00278  * @param node  The node to read from
00279  *
00280  * @return Status of the GPIO pins
00281  */
00282 static inline uint64_t __cvmx_gpio_read(uint8_t node)
00283 {
00284     cvmx_gpio_rx_dat_t gpio_rx_dat;
00285     gpio_rx_dat.u64 = cvmx_read_csr_node(node, CVMX_GPIO_RX_DAT);
00286     return gpio_rx_dat.s.dat;
00287 }
00288 
00289 /**
00290  * GPIO Read Data
00291  * @deprecated
00292  *
00293  * @return Status of the GPIO pins
00294  */
00295 static inline uint64_t cvmx_gpio_read(void)
00296 {
00297     return __cvmx_gpio_read(0);
00298 }
00299 static inline uint64_t cvmx_gpio_read_node(int node)
00300 {
00301     return __cvmx_gpio_read(node);
00302 }
00303 
00304 /**
00305  * GPIO Clear pin
00306  *
00307  * @param node       Node to clear pin on
00308  * @param clear_mask Bit mask to indicate which bits to drive to '0'.
00309  */
00310 static inline void __cvmx_gpio_clear(uint8_t node, uint64_t clear_mask)
00311 {
00312     cvmx_gpio_tx_clr_t gpio_tx_clr;
00313     gpio_tx_clr.u64 = 0;
00314     gpio_tx_clr.s.clr = clear_mask;
00315     cvmx_write_csr_node(node, CVMX_GPIO_TX_CLR, gpio_tx_clr.u64);
00316 }
00317 
00318 /**
00319  * GPIO Clear pin
00320  *
00321  * @param clear_mask Bit mask to indicate which bits to drive to '0'.
00322  */
00323 static inline void cvmx_gpio_clear(uint64_t clear_mask)
00324 {
00325     __cvmx_gpio_clear(0, clear_mask);
00326 }
00327 static inline void cvmx_gpio_clear_node(uint8_t node, uint64_t clear_mask)
00328 {
00329     __cvmx_gpio_clear(node, clear_mask);
00330 }
00331 
00332 /**
00333  * GPIO Set pin
00334  *
00335  * @param node     Node to set pins on
00336  * @param set_mask Bit mask to indicate which bits to drive to '1'.
00337  */
00338 static inline void __cvmx_gpio_set(uint8_t node, uint64_t set_mask)
00339 {
00340     cvmx_gpio_tx_set_t gpio_tx_set;
00341     gpio_tx_set.u64 = 0;
00342     gpio_tx_set.s.set = set_mask;
00343     cvmx_write_csr_node(node, CVMX_GPIO_TX_SET, gpio_tx_set.u64);
00344 }
00345 
00346 /**
00347  * GPIO Set pin
00348  * @deprecated
00349  *
00350  * @param set_mask Bit mask to indicate which bits to drive to '1'.
00351  */
00352 static inline void cvmx_gpio_set(uint64_t set_mask)
00353 {
00354     __cvmx_gpio_set(0, set_mask);
00355 }
00356 static inline void cvmx_gpio_set_node(uint8_t node, uint64_t set_mask)
00357 {
00358     __cvmx_gpio_set(node, set_mask);
00359 }
00360 
00361 /**
00362  * Configures a GPIO timer for the specified frequency.
00363  *
00364  * @param node      Node to set the GPIO timer on
00365  * @param timer     Timer number, 0-3 or 0x100-0x103 for node 1.
00366  * @param freq_in_hz    Frequency to toggle the GPIO line.  Set to 0 to disable
00367  *          the timer.
00368  */
00369 static inline void cvmx_gpio_set_freq(int node, unsigned int timer,
00370                       uint64_t freq_in_hz)
00371 {
00372     uint64_t sclock = cvmx_clock_get_rate(CVMX_CLOCK_SCLK);
00373     union cvmx_gpio_clk_genx clk_gen;
00374     uint64_t n;
00375 
00376     if (timer > 3) {
00377         cvmx_printf("%s: Error: timer %d out of range\n",
00378                 __func__, timer);
00379         return;
00380     }
00381 
00382     n = (freq_in_hz * (1ULL << 32)) / sclock;
00383 
00384     clk_gen.s.n = n;
00385     cvmx_write_csr_node(node, CVMX_GPIO_CLK_GENX(timer), clk_gen.u64);
00386 }
